sqlMap.select: select * from service where service_approved_no= 1 order by service_no desc

select a.* from service a, service_category_sub b, service_category_main c where a.service_category_sub_no = b.service_category_sub_no and b.service_category_main_no = c.service_category_main_no and c.service_category_main_no = #int# and a.service_approved_no= 1 order by service_no desc
select * from service where service_approved_no= 1 and service_category_sub_no=#int#

select B.SERVICE_CATEGORY_MAIN_NAME, C.SERVICE_CATEGORY_SUB_NAME, A.* from SERVICE A, SERVICE_CATEGORY_MAIN B, SERVICE_CATEGORY_SUB C WHERE mem_no = #int# AND A.SERVICE_CATEGORY_SUB_NO = C.SERVICE_CATEGORY_SUB_NO AND C.SERVICE_CATEGORY_MAIN_NO = B.SERVICE_CATEGORY_MAIN_NO order by SERVICE_NO

select b.service_category_main_name as service_category_main_name, c.service_category_sub_name as service_category_sub_name, a.service_no as service_no, a.service_name as service_name, a.service_info as service_info, a.service_price as service_price, a.service_approved_no as service_approved_no, a.addr_no as addr_no, a.service_category_sub_no as service_category_sub_no, a.service_approved_date as service_approved_date, a.mem_no as mem_no, d.mem_name as mem_name from service a, service_category_main b, service_category_sub c, mem d where a.service_category_sub_no = c.service_category_sub_no and c.service_category_main_no = b.service_category_main_no and a.mem_no=d.mem_no and service_no=#int#
select count(*) from service where service_approved_no = 1
select nvl(A.rate_point,0) from ( select rate.service_no, rate.rate_point from service left outer join rate on (rate.service_no=service.service_no) where service.service_no = #service_no#) A

select expert.mem_no as mem_no, nvl(expert.expert_career,'등록된 정보가 없습니다.') as expert_career, nvl(expert.expert_info,'등록된 정보가 없습니다.') as expert_info, nvl(expert.expert_contact,'등록된 정보가 없습니다.') as expert_contact, nvl(expert.expert_license,'등록된 정보가 없습니다.') as expert_license, nvl(expert.expert_education,'등록된 정보가 없습니다.') as expert_education from expert, service where expert.mem_no = service.mem_no and service.service_no = #service_no#

select A.* from (select rownum as rnum , B.* from ( select * from service order by service_no desc ) B
where rownum <= #end#) A where A.rnum >= #start#

select nvl(address.addr_longi,'없음') as addr_longi, nvl(address.addr_lati,'없음') as addr_lati from address right outer join service on (address.addr_no = service.addr_no) where service.service_no = #service_no#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into service (service_no, service_name, service_info,service_price,service_approved_no, mem_no, addr_no, service_category_sub_no, service_approved_date) values ( seq_service_no.nextval, #service_name#, #service_info#, #service_price#, 0, #mem_no#, #addr_no#, #service_category_sub_no#, null)
select max(service_no) as service_no from service

select seq_addr_no.nextval from dual
insert into address values (#addr_no#,#addr_longi#,#addr_lati#,#addr_zip#,#addr_road#,#addr_dong#)
sqlMap.select: select b.service_category_sub_name from service a, service_category_sub b where a.service_category_sub_no = b.service_category_sub_no and a.service_no = #int#

select address.addr_no,address.addr_longi, address.addr_lati,address.addr_zip,address.addr_road,address.addr_dong from service inner join address on service.addr_no = address.addr_no where service.service_no = #int#
sqlMap.update: update address set addr_longi = #addr_longi#, addr_lati = #addr_lati#, addr_zip = #addr_zip#, addr_road = #addr_road#, addr_dong = #addr_dong# where addr_no = #addr_no#
update service set service_name =#service_name#, service_info = #service_info#, service_price =#service_price#, service_category_sub_no =#service_category_sub_no# where service_no = #service_no#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from mem_wishlist where mem_no=#mem_no# and service_no=#service_no#
sqlMap.delete: delete from mem_wishlist where mem_no=#mem_no# and service_no=#service_no#
sqlMap.select: select a.service_no as service_no, a.service_name as service_name, a.service_info as service_info, a.service_price as service_price, a.service_approved_no as service_approved_no, a.addr_no as addr_no, a.service_category_sub_no as service_category_sub_no, a.service_approved_date as service_approved_date, a.mem_no as mem_no from service a, mem_wishlist b where a.service_no = b.service_no and b.mem_no = #int#
